venue.name: Todd Morsilli Clay Court Tennis Center, ROGER WILLIAMS PARK

item.description:
TENNIS 101:  May 1 - June 21

Enjoy this one hour class that will introduce the basics and FUNdamentals of tennis.  You will learn the proper techniques of the forehand, backhand, the volley, and introduction to the serve.

This is a fun and friendly class.  You will meet others who share your interest and desire to learn tennis.

Players are divided up across 3 courts and enjoy a low teacher to student ratio.

You may sign up for this class on both Tuesdays and Thursdays (recommended) or sign up for just one day each week.    5:30 - 6:30 pm.

This class meets for 8 weeks and costs either $80 or $160 depending upon whether you play once or twice each week.

 

Note: Players may borrow rackets from SPOT during their lessons.
item.how_to_find_us: Next to Zoo in Roger Williams Park or enter 100 Hawthorne St Providence, RI 02907 in GPS.
item.name: Tennis 101 Class
